house_listing.house_description: Home is very clean & beautiful! Ready to move in! You must see this lovely 1 story,3 bdrm, 2 full bath brick ranch home. Large rooms, very open & bright.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Central Realty RE/MAX Central Realty
